document_data.title: Against the Machine
document_data.story arc:
[[Adventurers League/Dreams of the Red Wizards|Dreams of the Red Wizards]]
Terminal Ambitions Adventure: The Cold Dark
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Against the Machine''''', designed by [[Greg Marks]] and [[Brandes Stoddard]], is an adventure in the [[Adventurers League/Dreams of the Red Wizards|Dreams of the Red Wizards]] storyline published for the [[Adventurers League]]. It is the fifth part of The Cold Dark series.

{{Quote|''Aware that someone in Xorvintroth opposes them, the Thayans have heavily reinforced the defenses around the Far Realm battery factory. A covert team must infiltrate and sabotage the facility before the Red Wizards can make more batteries.''{{Cite adventurers league/Against the Machine|1}}|}}
